name: Free Runner Vertical slice
description:
Free Runner Vertical slice

Made as part of a project in 2nd year college using unity

Focus of this game was  on animations

WASD/Left Stick - move

Spacebar/ B - jump

Jumping towards wall allows for wall run

Aware of the bugs in game

Implementations

Nested blend Tress, animations events, multiple animations IK, avatar mask.

Nested blend tree only see-able with a controller as its works on the float for movement

IK for the handplant forward jump works well but other IKs are very buggy, can be tested by jumping in front of waist height wall

animations taken from mixamo.com

audio taken from Unity standard assests pack
